RPGXplorerObject.Name: Armor Proficiency (Light)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Proficient at wearing all light armors.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Armor Proficiency (Medium)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Proficient at wearing medium armors.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Proficient at wearing all heavy armors.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shields Proficiency
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Proficient at using all shields except tower shields.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tower Shield Proficiency
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Proficient at using tower shields.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Simple Weapons Proficiency
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Proficient at using all simple weapons.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Martial Weapons Proficiency
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Proficient at using all martial weapons.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Illiteracy
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Cannot read or write. May spend 2 skill points to overcome.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Diamond Soul
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants spell resistance equal to granting class level + 10.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Favored Enemy
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Select a favored enemy as a Ranger does.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Greater Two-Weapon Fighting
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants third attack with off-hand weapon at -10.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Improved Two-Weapon Fighting
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants second attack with off-hand weapon at -5.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Run
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Run speed improved.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Two-Weapon Fighting
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Penalty for fighting with two weapons is reduced to -2/-6.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Weapon Finesse
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use DEX modifier on attack rolls instead of STR with certain weapons

RPGXplorerObject.Name: War Deity Favored Weapon
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants Weapon Focus in deity's favored weapon (if they have one).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ignore Encumberance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Speed not affected by encumberance.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Speed Weapon
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wielder gets one additional attack at BAB.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Nonlethal Weapon
RPGXplorerObject.Description: All damage dealt by the weapon inc. bonus damage becomes non-lethal.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Keen
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Threat range of weapon is doubled.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Throwing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Melee weapon gains range increment of 10ft.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Vicious
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon deals 1d6 damage to wielder.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Critical Increased to x4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Damage on critical is increased to x4.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Alignment Penalty 1
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Bestows 1 negative level on wielder of opposed alignment.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Alignment Penalty 2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Bestows 2 negative levels on wielder of opposed alignment.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ki Weapon
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon serves as channel for wielder's ki.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Holy Avenger Spell Resistance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon provides spell resistance equal to Paladin level + 5.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Critical Destroys
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Critical hits destroys target.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Double Damage
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon damage is doubled.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Critical Increased to x3
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Damage on critical is increased to x3.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cleave
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wielder use of Cleave feat with this weapon.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Uncanny Dodge
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Retain DEX modfiier to AC when flat-footed and similar.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Elude Touch
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Charisma bonus to touch attacks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionic Body
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain 2 hit points for each psionic feat you have.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionic Talent
RPGXplorerObject.Description: You gain additional power points to supplement those you already had.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Fast Movement Progression
RPGXplorerObject.Description: When granted by a class, the levels from that class count towards calculating the Monk fast-movment modifier.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: AC Bonus Progression
RPGXplorerObject.Description: When granted by a class, the levels from that class count towards calculating the Monk AC bonus modifier.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Improved Unarmed Damage
RPGXplorerObject.Description: When granted by a class, the levels from that class count towards calculating the Monk improved unarmed damage modifier.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Favored Enemy (Single)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Select a single favoured enemy.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Wisdom Ranged Attack
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can use Wisdom modifier for ranged attacks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Strength Thrown Attack
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can use Strength modifier for thrown attacks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Charisma Will Save
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can use Charisma modifier for will saves.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Intelligence Reflex Save
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can use Intelligence modifier for reflex saves.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Off-hand One-Handed Weapon Two-Weapon Fighting
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can use a one-handed weapon as if it were a light weapon whilst two-weapon fighting.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Wield Larger Melee Weapon
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Allows you to wield a weapon one size category larger without any extra effort.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Reduce Two-Weapon Fighting Penalty by 1
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Reduces the attack penalty for fighting with two-weapons by 1.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Reduce Two-Weapon Fighting Penalty by 2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Reduces the attack penalty for fighting with two-weapons by 2.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Constitution Armor Class
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can Use Constitution instead of Dexterity when calculating AC.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Multiattack
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Reduces the attack penalty to -2 for secondary natural weapons.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Constitution Nonability
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Creature does not have a Constitution score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dexterity Nonability
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Creature does not have a Dexterity score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Intelligence Nonability
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Creature does not have a Intelligence score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Strength Nonability
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Creature has no Strength score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Unlink BAB
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Unlinks a psicrystals BAB form its creator's.
